name: cypress-challenge
description: Cypress app to test the challenge

scripts.testAll: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/all/all.cy.js > test-results.txt && node Mailer.js
scripts.testLast: npx cypress run  --spec cypress/e2e/all/all.cy.js --env grepTags=ultimo > test-results.txt && node Mailer.js
scripts.testNoLast: npx cypress run --env grepUntagged=true > test-results.txt && node Mailer.js

author: JP
